00003 cTPPickup::cTPPickup(int nlane, int height, int ncolour, cPlayTable* npt) : cPickup() {
00004         
00005         lane = nlane;
00006         colour = ncolour;
00007         pt = npt;
00008         mode = TOPLAYTABLE;
00009         
00010         x = orig_pos[0] = 0.7*(-3+(nlane*3));
00011         y = orig_pos[1] = 0.9;
00012         z = orig_pos[2] = -8;
00013         
00014         target_pos[0] = -3+(nlane*3);
00015         target_pos[1] = 0;
00016         target_pos[2] = -height*3;
00017         
00018         start_time = SDL_GetTicks();
00019         
00020         result = -1;
00021 }

00027 void cTPPickup::update() {
00028 
00029         if (SDL_GetTicks() - start_time >= 500/speed) {
00030                 result = pt->addpickup(lane, colour);
00031                 deleteme = true;        
00032         }
00033         
00034         float u = (SDL_GetTicks() - start_time)/(500/speed);
00035         x = (1-u)*(orig_pos[0]) + (u)*(target_pos[0]);
00036         y = (1-u)*(orig_pos[1]) + (u)*(target_pos[1]);
00037         z = (1-u)*(orig_pos[2]) + (u)*(target_pos[2]);
00038         
00039 }
00040 
00041 void cTPPickup::draw() {
00042         
00043         glPushMatrix();
00044          glScalef(0.7, 0.7, 0.7);
00045          cPickup::draw();
00046         glPopMatrix();
00047 }
